name: ConceptDraw DIAGRAM SlideShow (Legacy)
summary: A CDS file is a slide show created by CS Odessa ConceptDraw DIAGRAM, an application used to create diagrams, flowcharts, and other types of drawings. It stores a slide show, which includes one or more pages of diagrams, along with settings, such as the visibility of slide breaks and previews. CS Odessa replaced CDS files with .CDSZ files in ConceptDraw DIAGRAM version 10.
